data.comment: The match is underway in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Leon Bailey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 2, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Harm Osmers awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of M´gladbach.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Leverkusen in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Lucas Alario gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 17, M´gladbach have been given a penalty...
Lukas Hradecky (Leverkusen) has received a yellow card from Harm Osmers.
Goal! Lars Stindl gives M´gladbach the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
In the minute 20, Leverkusen's Edmond Tapsoba is whistled for offside at BayArena.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for M´gladbach at BayArena.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 27, Lucas Alario is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Moussa Diaby.
Goal! Lars Stindl gives M´gladbach a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 34, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 38, Leverkusen push upfield but Harm Osmers quickly pulls them for offside.
In Leverkusen, M´gladbach push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
M´gladbach's Marcus Thuram misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Lucas Alario levels the score at 2-2.
Great play from Florian Wirtz to set up the goal.
In the minute 42, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Free kick M´gladbach.
M´gladbach pushes forward through Marcus Thuram, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 43, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Harm Osmers will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Harm Osmers signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In the minute 45, Leverkusen are in shooting range from this free kick.
The first half has been concluded at BayArena.
At BayArena, Ramy Bensebaini has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at BayArena.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of M´gladbach.
Hannes Wolf is on a sub for Florian Neuhaus for M´gladbach.
In the minute 46, M´gladbach's Breel Embolo has been booked in Leverkusen.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at BayArena.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Lars Bender (Leverkusen) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Harm Osmers awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Leverkusen have an attacking throw-in.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick Leverkusen.
The away team replace Breel Embolo with Valentino Lazaro.
Leverkusen push forward at BayArena and Moussa Diaby gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen take a 3-2 lead thanks to Leon Bailey.
Moussa Diaby with an assist there.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 74, M´gladbach make their third substitution with Alassane Plea replacing Stefan Lainer.
Laszlo Benes is replacing Christoph Kramer for the away team.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a fifth substitution, with Patrick Herrmann replacing Marcus Thuram.
Peter Bosz is making the team's first substitution at BayArena with Karim Bellarabi replacing Lucas Alario.
In the minute 81, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Goal! Julian Baumgartlinger extends Leverkusen's lead to 4-2.
Nadiem Amiri instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Leverkusen.
Florian Wirtz (Leverkusen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Lars Bender with Aleksandar Dragovic. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 86, Moussa Diaby (Leverkusen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Leverkusen advance rapidly upfield but Harm Osmers blows for offside.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match is over. Final score 4-3.
Valentino Lazaro puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 4-3.
